data.name: Watermelon Country
data.detailed_description: See Watermelons! Get Watermelons! Tackle enemies who stand in your way. Watermelon Country is a casual adventure game where you have to use timing and skill to reach the end of each level. Love Watermelon? Love stylized gaming filters then give this a go!
data.about_the_game: See Watermelons! Get Watermelons! Tackle enemies who stand in your way. Watermelon Country is a casual adventure game where you have to use timing and skill to reach the end of each level. Love Watermelon? Love stylized gaming filters then give this a go!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 17763.1
  • Processor: 1 gigahertz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® Graphics - BETA Windows® 10 DCH Drivers.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: HXHLWN. PCIe Sound Card, 5.1 Internal Sound Card for PC Windows 10 8 7. ...
